name: Pumpkin Toss
description:
Help guide the pumpkins to their destination through various locations. From friendly neighborhoods to dry deserts, these pumpkins are determined to finish their journey. Use your launch meter to toss them up into the air, above obstacles, or over gaps, so long as they make it the end.

Entire game is played with the space bar.

3D Asset Pack:  Low Poly Ultimate Pack

Music licensed under CC 4.0:

Autumn Leaves

Happy Together

Still Green

Off Road

This is an entry to the One Button Game Jam.
